alert.note: Alert for Denali (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued June 06 at 9:33AM AKDT until June 06 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 PM AKDT THIS EVENING FOR DENALI... The National Weather Service in Fairbanks has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 2 PM this afternoon to 10 PM AKDT this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Near the Parks Highway from Denali Park north. * TIMING...From 2 PM this afternoon to 10 PM AKDT this evening. * WINDS...Southeast 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 24 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the lower to mid 70s. * IMPACTS...Rapid ignition, growth and spread of fires are possible.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that conditions are occurring or will occur which could lead to the development of large and dangerous fires. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them, to the public. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.
